subject: Regarding JUnit TestSuite creation and execution
msgSnippet: Hi All, I am new to this group. I have some doubts in JUnit TestSuite creation and execution. For eg:- 1. I have a classs file named Calculator.java 2. And I
messageBody:
Hi All,

I am new to this group.

I have some doubts in JUnit TestSuite creation and execution.
For eg:-

1. I have a classs file named Calculator.java

2. And I have 4 JUnit test case for the calculator class named

a. CalculatorTestAdd
b. CalculatorTestSubtract
c. CalculatorTestMultiply
d. CalculatorTestDivide

I would like to create a TestSuite with these test cases.

So, I just want to know how to create TestSuite in JUnit, by including all the above 4 test cases in the TestSuite.

Can anyone help me in this situation.


---------------------------------
Download prohibited? No problem. CHAT from any browser, without download.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
